Row.Text: Gain [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] 500 Culture when you discover a [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_NATURAL_WONDER] Natural Wonder in Distant Lands. Gain a [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relic every time you study a [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Civic Mastery after completing the [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Landn치mab칩k Civic. [icon:UNIT_MISSIONARY] Missionaries cost 100% more.

[BLIST][LI]Gain [B]500 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture[/B] when you discover a [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_NATURAL_WONDER] [B]Natural Wonder[/B] in [B]Distant Lands[/B] (On Standard Speed). [LI]Gain a [B][icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relic[/B] every time you study a [B][icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Civic Mastery[/B] after completing the [B][icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Landn치mab칩k Civic[/B].[LI][icon:UNIT_MISSIONARY] [B]Missionaries[/B] cost [B]100%[/B] more.[LI][B]+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Reykjaholt[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Iceland's associated [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Wonder.
